thread.title_full: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle Support Their Charities During Separate Trips -- See the Pics

author: Leena Tailor
title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle Support Their Charities During Separate Trips -- See the Pics
text: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle Support Their Charities During Separate Trips -- See the Pics by Leena Tailor 3:10 PM   Photo: The Image Direct As the world watches their highly publicized romance unfold, Meghan Markle and Prince Harry are putting life in the public eye to good use with charity work. Markle was snapped arrived in Mumbai Airport in India on Saturday, after visiting Delhi, where she spent time promoting young womenâ€™s health for World Vision Canada. The 35-year-old Canadian actress spent five days promoting hygiene as part of her work as an ambassador for the charity. During the visit, the Suits star also enjoyed local culture by getting her hands painted with henna. Photo: Image Direct Meanwhile, her boyfriend, Prince Harry, was also making philanthropic efforts , visiting the Help for Heroes Recovery Center in Tidworth, England, on Monday. The 32-year-old royal met with war veterans and spoke about the importance of psychological well-being for men and women who have been injured in the line of duty. Photo: Getty Images
